utterances.speaker: SEAN HANNITY, FOX NEWS HOST

utterances.utterance: All right, Trace Gallagher, thank you tonight. We appreciate that report. utterances.utterance: And this goes back to your last question whether this is is about cops, racial injustice.

utterances.utterance: There were cops that laughed at us yesterday, cops that looked just like me that laughed at us when we asked them to take a knee with us, OK? This is about a suit, OK?
